doc.str: A device for use in water comprising a carrier having an interior cavity and one or more openings allowing ingress to and egress from the interior cavity; and a moss contained within the interior cavity in which the carrier completely encloses the moss.

Jones et al., "A Preliminary Study of Antimicrobial Activity in Some Malaysian Mosses (Bryophytina)", Malays. Appl.
